channel.title: [PLEASE READ]Help with NPC dialogue...[ATTENTION][NEED HELP!]
channel.description: OK, guys i have a quick question. Im trying to add a npc dialogue and i want him to say one thing, click to continue, another thing, click to continue, another thing, etc, etc, etc. like a chain. but it just stops at the first one all the time. how do i make him say everything?

item.title: [PLEASE READ]Help with NPC dialogue...[ATTENTION][NEED HELP!]
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
